title: How to Reset VPN
content: To reset your VPN, disconnect from the tray icon and reconnect.

title: Installing Printer Drivers
content: Visit the manufacturer's website and download the correct driver for your OS.

title: WiFi Troubleshooting
content: Try restarting your router and checking the WiFi adapter settings.

title: Email Setup on Mobile
content: Use the official app for your email provider and enter your credentials.

title: Clearing Browser Cache
content: In Chrome, open Settings > Privacy > Clear Browsing Data.

title: Two-Factor Authentication
content: Enable 2FA in your account security settings for extra protection.

title: Using the VPN on Mac
content: Install the VPN client, enter your credentials, and connect.

title: Remote Desktop Connection
content: Open Remote Desktop and enter the IP address of your work computer.

title: Managing Email Filters
content: Set up filters in your email client to automatically sort messages.

title: Software Updates
content: Keep your system secure by regularly checking for software updates.

title: Printer Not Responding
content: Check printer connections, restart the device, and reinstall drivers if necessary.

title: Video Conferencing Tips
content: Use a stable internet connection and a good headset to reduce echo.

title: Password Reset
content: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the steps.

title: Troubleshooting Slow Computer
content: Check for background processes, malware, and free up disk space.

title: Connecting to a Shared Drive
content: Use File Explorer or Finder to map the shared network drive.
